modName: Conjure Argonian Maid and Lusty Argonian Maid made skill book
summary: Earn a unique Conjure Argonian Maid spell as the reward of finding the first edition of the book. The original vol.1 and vol.2 are made to One-Handed skill books as well.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]Disappointed by the folio version of The Lusty Argonian Maid? Want to actually able to conjure up an argonian maid to serve you and help you clean your chamber? You are at the right place![/size]

[b][size=5]What this mod does:
[/size][/b][list]
[*][size=3]Changes the [b]Lusty Argonian Maid Folio[/b] from a book to a spell tome, granting the [b]Conjure Argonian Maid[/b] spell on consumption.[/size]
[*][size=3]Changes [b]The Lusty Argonian Maid, vol.1[/b] and [/size][size=5][size=3][b]The Lusty Argonian Maid, vol.2[/b] into One-Handed skill books.[/size][/size]
[*][size=5][size=3]Adds [b]Staff of the Argonian Maid[/b] and the related recipes.[/size][/size]
[*][size=5][size=3]A new and unplayable [b]Amulet of Lust[/b] uniquely for the Maid.[/size][/size]
[/list]
[size=5][size=3][b][size=5]What this mod does not do:
[/size][/b][/size][/size][list]
[*][size=5][size=3][b][size=5][/size][/b]Adding any new volumes of The Lusty Argonian Maid(May add in future versions)[/size][/size]
[/list][size=5][size=3][b][size=5]
Practicality:[/size][/b]
[/size][/size][size=3]The Argonian Maid is using a Bandit chief AI and levels up to 45. She has got a unique combat style specifically designed for her, which makes her a very formidable opponent. Her defenses are hindered by wearing outfits, but her aggressive attacks shall compensate for it.
[/size]
[b][size=5]Stats:
[/size][/b][size=3]Race: Argonian
Level: 15 - 30 - 45 (3 versions)
Health: 219(15) - 384(30) - 604(50)
Magicka: 50
Stamina: 156(15) - 216(30) - 296(50)
Equipments:
Lv 15: Steel Sword, Hunting Bow, Steel Arrow, Amulet of Lust
Lv 30:[size=3] Orcish Sword, Orcish Bow, Steel Arrow, Amulet of Lust[/size]
Lv 45: Elven [size=3]Sword, Elven Bow, Steel Arrow, Amulet of Lust[/size]
Amulet of Lust Effect: x1.1 damage to male enemies[/size]

[size=3]Perks:
Lv 15: Fighting Stance, Bladesman(1), Armsman(2), Shield Wall(2)
Lv 30: [/size][size=3][size=3]Fighting Stance, Savage Strike, Bladesman(2), Armsman(3), Shield Wall[/size](3)
Lv 45: [size=3]Fighting Stance, Savage Strike, Bladesman(3), Armsman(4), Shield Wall[/size](4)

[b][size=5]To-do:[/size][/b]
[/size][list]
[*][size=3]Able to randomly summon Mage Argonian Maid and Fighter Argonian Maid
[/size]
[/list]
author: falco99
